transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Ji Rahul sir, mai Riya bol rahi hu Indiamart head office se.
Customer: Ha ji mam.
Executive: Ha sir, wo baat hui aapki aapka jo issue tha wo solve ho gaya?
Customer: Nahi wo abhi video meet ke liye bola tha. Ha to abhi usko karna hai.
Executive: Sir unka Ravi Gupta se aapki baat hui thi right unka call to aapko 3 baje ke around aaya tha mai baat karwa du aapki?
Customer: Ha wo video meeting karna padega usme wo ek bar abhi system on kar leta hu.
Executive: Please aap isko kar lijiye sir jitna jaldi aap kar lenge utna hi jaldi aapka issue resolve ho jayega.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: To mai bol deti hu ki Ravi Gupta se aapki baat hui thi hai na dopahar me 11-12 baje unhone kuch aapko guide kiya tha fir unhone bola tha ki wo aapko call karenge video meet pe hai na.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Mai unko ek bar ping kar deti hu ki wo aapko instant call kar le aur hum isko video meet kar lete hai. Thik hai?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Okay chalo.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's issue is not yet resolved.



Resolution:

- Executive offered to connect with Ravi Gupta.

- Executive will ping Ravi Gupta for instant call.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will do video meet.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- video meet, issue resolution, follow up
